str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From a compound of ek and a derivative of kaleo; a calling out, i.e. a popular meeting, especially a religious congregation.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
Probably from the base of ginosko; the intellect, i.e. Mind; by implication, meaning.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To instruct orally, teach, inform. From kata and echos; to sound down into the ears, i.e. to indoctrinate or to apprise of.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
Plural of an apparently primary word; ten thousand; by extension, innumerably many.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The tongue; by implication, a language.
